context: Stomach pain and stomach upset,High cholesterol,Blood Pressure Changes,
review: Doctor is young , a very good man , has a very good personality , simple yet very sophisticated , ** ****** ** *** ***** * *** **** **** ******** ******** * **** ** ****** ***** ***** **,  Dr. Aggarwal got to the underlying problem , he treated me from within *** *** **** **** **** ** ******** **** **** ***** ******* *** ***** **** ** **** ***** ** **** ******* ********* *********** ********** He is a very patient listner , friendly , gives adequate time , makes u feel comfortable  , i always like talking to him whenever there's a visit , he made me understand all my problems , treated me well , I am doing really good now.  Dr. Aggarwal is also treating my brother for irregular heart beat , blood urea, hypothyroidism and anxiety and he is also doing well now. I recommend him 100%. I want to personally thank Dr. Surya Aggarwal for all his kindness, help and support in our perilous times. Thank You very much Sir. God Bless You.
reply_text: üëçwish u a great health always

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Has expertise in his work, Extremely Polite, You just talk to him AND half of your illness is gone,that much friendly he is.  I had fever even after taking antibiotics.then I consulted Dr. Surya and he Cured my typhoid in a week. Also answered all my queries regarding diet and all.Thank you so much  Sir.
reply_text: Have a speedy recovery

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: We were already seeing a doctor but wanted to get a second opinion from Dr Surya. After Dr Surya changed my mother's medication, she started to see some issues like loss of appetite, increased blood sugar, and heel pain ***** *** ****** My mother is diabetic and had bilateral knee replacement surgery a couple of years back. When we went to some other doctor because of our dissatisfaction, he pointed out that my mother's thyroid was low (after being high sometime earlier) and Dr Surya continued thyroid medication* ***** ***** **** *** **************
reply_text: Apologies but i must have discussed this with u. Hope your mother is getting better now.

review: I visited to doctor for my fever issue. My body temperature is not going down after taking medicines. Initially sir listen my complete health related problems or symptoms and then he explained me in details and provided medicine and advised for few tests. He is very polite and soft spoken. I really liked him and recommend others to visit.
reply_text: We are here to help u in any way we can. Hopefully u are doing good now rupan

review: This was probably the best medical consultation experience I've ever had with the doctor devoting ample time to get to know about each and every problem and offering advice and solutions at length and trying to leave no stone unturned. I would recommend visiting him without a second's thought.
reply_text: Get well soon
